meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern salad made with bulgur, tomatoes, cucumbers, parsley, mint, and lemon juice.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing taboulehs for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She prepared a delicious taboulehs for the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The taboulehs danced on my taste buds with its zesty flavors.
meanings.sent4: The taboulehs was a burst of freshness in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the taboulehs made it irresistible.

meanings.sent1: The taboulehs at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent2: We bought two containers of taboulehs for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The taboulehs in the fridge were having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The taboulehs overflowed from the bowl, a sign of abundance.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the taboulehs filled the room with freshness.
